name: Bolt Checkout for BigCommerce
author: Bolt

sections.description:
Bolt provides an Amazon-like checkout experience that drives a 10 – 50% lift in revenue. Low-converting checkouts lead to lost revenue and unhappy customers.

Bolt is the ultimate checkout solution for WordPress Bigcommerce merchants who want to boost their sales and provide the security & speed customers expect.

Why Merchants love Bolt:

  • Lift checkout conversion – Bolt’s hyper-optimized checkout improves revenue by 10-50%.
  • Boost customer LTV – Amazon-like single-click checkout for seamless repeat purchases.
  • Zero fraud guarantee – Built-in fraud management using high-precision machine learning, with 100% coverage of all fraudulent chargebacks.
  • Made for Mobile – Bolt is the world’s highest performing checkout, no matter the device. Bolt is mobile-optimized improving mobile conversion rates by 83%.*

Features

  • Single-click checkout that plugs directly into your website for seamless desktop and mobile commerce.
  • Hassle-free installation
  • Unparalleled analytics into your online sales on our merchant dashboard
  • Industry-leading fraud detection, powered by machine learning and human order review handled by Bolt’s highly trained risk team, which frees you to focus on your business
  • 100% coverage of fraudulent chargebacks including full international risk coverage.
  • Dedicated account management
  • Bank-level security, Bolt is PCI DSS Level I and GDPR compliant, and uses the industry best security practices and tools.

*Percentage increase in mobile conversion rates compares Bolt checkout completion rates across online retail partners from Aug 6 – Sep 4, 2018 to compiled benchmarks from the Baymard Institute, Barilliance, and Formisimo

WooCommerce plugin

If you currently uses WooCommerce, Bolt also provides a WooCommerce plugin.
sections.installation:
In addition to BigCommerce account, a Bolt merchant account is required for setup. Please contact sales@bolt.com or schedule a check-in with our team at bolt.com to check your eligibility.

Automatic Installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers. Log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

Manual Installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our plugin and uploading it to your server via SFTP. Please contact Bolt team for further instruction.
